TextView.android:text: Create easy a playlist on the pc with the free program Playlist Creator:

Use the format m3u.
 Now put the m3u file in you music folder, the playlist will not work ,because the paths to the file are wrong.
 To fix this we need to edit the file.
 First read the file to check what you need to change, use default or the other path to open the playlist, only the name and .m3u needs to filled in.
 An example of a m3u file:


#EXTM3U
 #EXTINF:295,PrimeMusic.ru November 2013 - 1 - Direct Dizko (Original Mix) (PrimeMusic.ru)
 \\DS2\music\playlist luuk\Sander Van Doorn and Yves V - Direct Dizko (Original Mix).mp3
 #EXTINF:243, - - Revolution (Instrumental Mix)
 \\DS2\music\playlist luuk\R3hab, Nervo, Ummet Ozcan - Revolution (Instrumental Mix).mp3
 #EXTINF:248, - - R3HAB - I NEED R3HAB 060
 \\DS2\music\playlist luuk\Syn Cole - Miami 82 (Avicii Edit).mp3


This needs to be changed to this if you put the m3u file in you music folder, so this is the folder with the mp3 in it:


#EXTM3U
 #EXTINF:295,PrimeMusic.ru November 2013 - 1 - Direct Dizko (Original Mix) (PrimeMusic.ru)
 \Sander Van Doorn and Yves V - Direct Dizko (Original Mix).mp3
 #EXTINF:243, - - Revolution (Instrumental Mix)
 \R3hab, Nervo, Ummet Ozcan - Revolution (Instrumental Mix).mp3
 #EXTINF:248, - - R3HAB - I NEED R3HAB 060
 \Syn Cole - Miami 82 (Avicii Edit).mp3


Now this can be done by filling in The text to replace with:
 \\DS2\music\playlist luuk
 And leave the With the following text just empty
